title: Message on the 19th Anniversary of the German Evangelical Church of Brooklyn, New York.
text:
My dear Mr. Peters:

Please present to the members of the German Evangelical Church of Brooklyn, my hearty congratulations on the ninetieth anniversary of the establishment of the church. I wish it all success in continuing its contribution to the spiritual advancement of the community. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Rev. Herbert H. Peters, Pastor, German Evangelical Church, 61 Schermerhorn Street, Brooklyn, N.Y.]
